00015 bool initialized = false;
00016 
00017 }

00027 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00028                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00029 {
00030     // Check the number of arguments
00031     if (nrhs<1 || ((nrhs%2)!=1) || nlhs>2)
00032         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00033 
00034     if (!initialized) {
00035         initModule_nonfree();
00036         initialized = true;
00037     }
00038 
00039     // Argument vector
00040     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00041 
00042     // return the descriptor size (64/128)
00043     if (nrhs==1 && rhs[0].isChar() && rhs[0].toString()=="DescriptorSize") {
00044         plhs[0] = MxArray(SURF().descriptorSize());
00045         return;
00046     }
00047 
00048     // Option processing
00049     double hessianThreshold=100;
00050     int nOctaves=4;
00051     int nOctaveLayers=2;
00052     bool extended=true;
00053     bool upright=false;
00054     Mat mask;
00055     for (int i=1; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00056         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00057         if (key=="HessianThreshold")
00058             hessianThreshold = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00059         else if (key=="NOctaves")
00060             nOctaves = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00061         else if (key=="NOctaveLayers")
00062             nOctaveLayers = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00063         else if (key=="Extended")
00064             extended = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00065         else if (key=="UpRight")
00066             upright = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00067         else if (key=="Mask")
00068             mask = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_8U);
00069         else
00070             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00071     }
00072 
00073     // Process
00074     SURF surf(hessianThreshold,nOctaves,nOctaveLayers,extended,upright);
00075     Mat image(rhs[0].toMat());
00076     vector<KeyPoint> keypoints;
00077     bool useProvidedKeypoints=false;
00078     if (nlhs>1) {
00079         vector<float> descriptors;
00080         surf(image, mask, keypoints, descriptors, useProvidedKeypoints);
00081         Mat m(descriptors);
00082         plhs[1] = MxArray(m.reshape(0, keypoints.size()));
00083     }
00084     else
00085         surf(image, mask, keypoints);
00086     plhs[0] = MxArray(keypoints);
00087 }
